features: Snail Mucin: Touted for boosting skin hydration & reducing skin inflammation, 95% snail mucin concentrate binds moisture to skin while helping naturally exfoliate and target dark spots, fine lines and wrinkles.

Cica & Hyaluronic Acid: Cica can help stimulate collagen production while it also tightens, repairs, fights breakouts, and soothes your skin. Hyaluronic acid is proven to help wounds heal faster, reduce scarring, and allow the skin to stretch and flex.

Safe for All Skin Types: This gentle formula will not clog pores making it suitable for dry, normal, oily, sensitive, or acne-prone skin. A perfect addition to your skincare routine for both men & women.
Clean Formula: Revolutionary cruelty-free clean formula is alcohol-free, sulfate-free, fragrance-free, paraben-free, gluten-free, and Leaping Bunny certified.

Our Take: If you love your K-Beauty ingredients, snail mucin probably tops your list for its powerful-yet-gentle results. Snail mucin is uniquely combined with Cica to hydrate, gently exfoliate, fight blemishes, and target dark spots.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: For All Skin Types This gentle formula will not clog pores making it suitable for dry, normal, oily, sensitive, or acne-prone skin. How to Use Use after cleansing, follow up with rest of routine. Can be applied with hands or cotton pads. External use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool and dry place. Snail Mucin This antimicrobial enzyme produced by snails helps heal acne scarring including hyperpigmentation; firm, regenerate and hydrate skin. 3-Step Snail Mucin Routine This Non-Comedogenic face toner helps transform skin so that it looks smooth and clear. Snail mucin is uniquely combined with Cica, to hydrate, gently exfoliate, fight blemishes, and target dark spots.

Cruelty-Free Formula Our formula contains zero alcohol, fragrance or harsh chemicals. Gluten-free. Cruelty-free and Leaping Bunny-certified. Our Promise Our Peach Slices collection is clean, effective and fun! We bring you the latest and greatest high-performance products with trendsetting, innovative formulas and textures. Play, experiment, multi-mask. Cica Well-known for its healing, soothing, antibacterial, and anti-inflammatory properties, making it ideal for sensitive skin. Hyaluronic Acid Is proven to help wounds heal faster, reduce scarring, and allow the skin to stretch and flex.

Snail Rescue Toner Snail Rescue Wash-Off Jelly Mask Snail Rescue Moisturizer Deep Blemish Microdarts Acne Spot Dots Dark Spot Microdarts Description Fast-absorbing toner is your fast track to hydrated, blemish-free skin and an even glow with 95% snail mucin and cica. "Snail jelly" mask instantly refreshes and calms as it's applied onto the skin. This intensive treatment clears skin and targets dark spots, blemishes, pores, and dullness. This weightless moisturizer helps quench thirsty skin, zap zits, and minimize shine thanks to 95% snail mucin and cica. Microdart patches for emerging and underground blemishes. Speedy, non-drying acne treatment patches. Microdart patches for dark spots and hyperpigmentation. Daily Acne Routine Step 1 ✓ Daily Acne Routine Step 2 ✓ Daily Acne Routine Step 3 ✓ Early Stages & Deep Pimples ✓ Active Blemishes ✓ Post Zit Redness & Dark Spots ✓ Vegan ✓ ✓ ✓ Cruelty-Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ No Harmful Chemicals ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a toner that would be great to help moisturize my skin during the cold winter months. This one worked out perfectly. My skin still feels moist. Two hours after application, but it does not look greasy. I would suggest applying it with your hands rather than a cotton round to get the most use out of this in the beginning I was using a cotton round but the product was running out very fast. This is also thicker than a traditional cleansing toner. My suggestion would be one to two drops on the palm, and then spreading it on the face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than corsrx
reviews.reviewText: I originally wanted to try the corsrx one but couldn't justify paying so much in case my face didn't like it so I bought this one. I never regretted it. It's super good, hydrating, works well to heal skin, I've actually used it on my tattoos (after they've healed) and made my skin super smooth and smoothed down any acne that may be forming. I've loved this product soo much I've bought it 5 times. Then I found something even better, the etude moistfull collagen toner. If I thought this product was a 10/10 then that one is an 11/10. It's even better and just as hydrating. Both products are scent free, nonstick, works well for sensitive skin, and quite affordable. I love etude for their makeup and skincare but now I'm even more impressed with them. I highly recommend trying them both.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars YES YES YES!!
reviews.reviewText: This is what I’ve been looking for when it comes to a toner!! Been using for almost 2 weeks and can already see a big difference! Face is smoother and blemishes are clearing up. Ordering another bottle because these will sell fast!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The texture is pretty thick, and I love it. This is such a great toner for the few days I’ve been using it! Only thing is the smell.. smells like nail polish but way less intense. I would still purchase tho!-Erin SunTikTok: erin21459

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Everyone saying it’s not moisturizing you need a moisturizer as well as this product!! I don’t have good skin but I’m going to try out this it felt nice in my skin it does feel moisturizing you just need a moisturizer on top

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great product for me!
reviews.reviewText: i was a bit nervous to try this but i don’t regret it! i was nervous i would have a reaction but if anything my skin is looking much better! another thing i like about this toner is it is hydrating and doesn’t leave my skin feeling too dry or tight but still works as a toner and is a great base for the rest of my routine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite toner!
reviews.reviewText: I like to use this after double cleansing. I apply its to a cotton pad and wipe over my face before letting it dry. Gets the last bit of dirt off my face and leaves my skin soft and glowy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Makes my face feel super clean! Not very drying which is nice, and you don't need very much so it lasts awhile.
